description: Update the role of a storage array within an Asynchronous Mirror Group (AMG).

force.description: Whether to force the role reversal regardless of the online-state of the primary

ssid.description: The ID of the primary storage array for the async mirror action

api_password.description: The password to authenticate with the SANtricity WebServices Proxy or embedded REST API.

role.description: Whether the array should be the primary or secondary array for the AMG

api_username.description: The username to authenticate with the SANtricity WebServices Proxy or embedded REST API.

noSync.description: Whether to avoid synchronization prior to role reversal

api_url.description: The url to the SANtricity WebServices Proxy or embedded REST API.
